mapper.delete: delete from ds_pes_customer_employee_month where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ds_pes_customer_employee_month(storeno,storename,platformid,cityname,employeeNo,new_cusnum_ten,cusnum,cusnum_ten,year,month) SELECT c.store_code,c.store_name,c.store_id,c.store_city_name,c.info_employee_a_no,c.new_10_count,c.total,ifnull(b.total_ten,0) as total_ten,YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)),MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)) FROM (select tor.store_code,tor.store_id,tor.store_name,tor.store_city_name,tor.info_employee_a_no,sum(case when customer_isnew_flag >='10' and customer_isnew_flag !='-1' then 1 else 0 end) as new_10_count ,count(DISTINCT(tor.customer_id)) as total from df_mass_order_monthly tor where tor.customer_id not like 'fakecustomer%' and tor.sign_time >=#{begindate} and tor.sign_time < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' and tor.store_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' and tor.store_white!='QA' AND tor.store_status =0 group by info_employee_a_no) c LEFT JOIN (select a.info_employee_a_no,sum(case when a.monetary > 10 then 1 else 0 end ) as total_ten from (select tor.info_employee_a_no,sum(IFNULL(tor.gmv_price,0)) as monetary from df_mass_order_monthly tor where tor.customer_id not like 'fakecustomer%' and tor.sign_time >=#{begindate} and tor.sign_time < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' and tor.store_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' and tor.store_white!='QA' AND tor.store_status =0 group by info_employee_a_no,customer_id ) a group by a.info_employee_a_no) b on c.info_employee_a_no = b.info_employee_a_no
